description: Some say it’s hard to change their stripes. They went further and totally redesigned their Stride micro crew running sock for the lightest and smoothest fit — topped it off with performance arch support to reduce fatigue, flex windows for zero bunching and enhanced durability where their athletes need it most. Nah, wasn’t that hard.
name: Darn Tough Socks Stride Micro Crew Ultralight Socks - Mens
